title: Science Inquiry Competency Enhancement Course for Integrating Open Educational Practices (OEP)

context.prior_knowledge: Mid-level or higher professional experience in scientific fields and foundational understanding of OER (Open Educational Resources), basic knowledge of scientific inquiry methods (hypothesis formulation, experimental design, data analysis)
context.additional_context: Emphasizes OEP (Open Educational Practices) competency through real-time interaction in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Focuses on building remote collaborative learning environments using scientific observation and measurement techniques.

learning_goals: Learners will develop hypotheses and experimental designs for solving real-world problems in science by utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER).
Learners will experience the OER creation process through peer assessment and feedback based on a constructivist approach and enhance their analytical skills regarding the scientific inquiry process.

Learners will integrate science education content by applying the 5Rs (Retain, Reuse, Revise, Remix, Redistribute) framework and learn methods for controlling variables and deriving evidence-based conclusions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
